text:
@PressSec You, @realDonaldTrump, and the @GOP killed him.

Your misinformation, unwillingness to address the pandemic, and inability to admit wrongs have resulted in MANY deaths.

Disgusting.

#TrumpGenocide
#COVID19 
#HermanCain
